definition: a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world

definition: lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
